data.meta_description: Let USA TODAY 10Best's local experts guide you to the best restaurants, attractions, nightlife, clubs, bars, hotels, events, and shopping in St....
data.text:
About St. Catharines

Photo courtesy of Flickr.com

Just minutes from Niagara Falls, St. Catharines boasts a whole lot of unique adventures that one can partake in to get away from all the hustle and bustle of Niagara Falls. We all know you need some downtime on your vacation, and what better way to do so than head on over to St. Catharines and explore this city for a day.

See & Do

At The St. Catharines Museum you'll get to not only take in all the history of the shipping world of The Niagara Region but you'll also get to explore just exactly how those 'ships climb the mountain'. This certainly is the perfect activity to partake in during those warm summer months as you can enjoy an ice cream while watching the variety of ships passing through each lock.

Eat

At Mai Vi you'll experience some of the very freshest of flavors any Vietnamese restaurant has to offer. The chefs at this lovely restaurant continually create masterpieces that have the locals coming back every week. If you want to experience a delicious, authentic Vietnamese meal, than Mai Vi is the place for you.

Party

Okay, so it's not everyday that you hear of a fruit beer, brewed right on location. But at The Merchant Ale House, that's exactly what you will here. You'll be amazed at the unique blends of beer the brew masters here have handcrafted only using 4 very important ingredients. So if you love beer and enjoying a pint or two with a whole slew of friends, than this is the spot for you.

Stay

At The Best Western Hotel and Conference Centre you'll enjoy a little rest and relaxation away from all the hype and chaos Niagara Falls brings. Here you will be able to certainly get a whole lot of shut eye as you embark on your weekend in the Niagara Region. Just minutes away from Niagara Falls and surrounding areas, this hotel boasts a whole lot of comfort to your stay.

Shop

Ahh the joys of shopping! If you're one who loves to head on out to the mall on a rainy day, than The Pen Centre is the place for you. With a variety of stores for each and everyone of your fellow travelers you can certainly be lost in the stores located here. Continually recreating itself The Pen Centre is one of the best malls in the area.
